group.line: You wouldn't happen to know where we are
Bahaha I'm messing with ya! We're in prison of course!
Yep, I've been living behind bars for, what, 50 years now?
That's my best guess anyway! I ran out of space on my cell walls to mark the days looooong ago, friends!
Not that I'm complaining. It's cozy down here. Don't you agree?
Right? OK, well I'm gonna poke around outside, so I'll see you all later.
I was going to invite you to use my escape tunnel with me, but it seems like you'd rather spend eternity in this cell!
Well, here's something that might interest you.
When I was first thrown in this cell I noticed that some of the stones in the floor were loose.
I was able to remove the stones, and behind them I found a tunnel that led straight out of town!
I can't imagine why anyone might need a tunnel, but if you're so keen on leaving, you're welcome to try it.
It was nice to meet all of you! Best of luck! Goodbye!
